TextView.android:text:
I Semester

				Paper-I-Poetry From Chaucer to 17th Century 
				Paper-II-Drama Elizabethan and Jacobean Drama 
				Paper-III-Fiction origins and developments upto 18th century 
				Paper-IV-Indian Writing in English and in Translation 
				Elective (within the department)-classics in translation 
				Elective (for other departments)-spoken English 
				Soft skills-Essentials of Lang and Comm


II Semester

				Paper V-Americal literature 
				Paper VI-Eighteenth to Nineteenth Century 
				Paper-VII-Restoration to Twentieth Century 
				Paper-VIII-Nineteenth to Twentieth Century 
				Elective (within the department)-English for careers 
				Elective (for other department)-English for careers 
				Soft Skills-Spoken and Presentation Skills
